group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*

group_1.textLeft: Finally made it!

group_1.textRight: It wasn't that far, but all those hills@made it a total hike...

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if Mitama's okay...

group_1.textRight: She'll be alright!@Sunao and Shizuka are with her.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right.
...We'll go ahead and get started, then.@Time to check out this monument.
Let's find some clues about where@the shipwreck is!

group_1.textRight: Just what I was thinking!
So, uh...what exactly are we supposed@to do?

group_1.textLeft: Right now, let's have a look around and@take photos of anythin' that looks off.
We can ask Yuta to examine them and@see what he finds out.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... That's a good thing to do.
But knowing that there used to be@a Diviner here...
There's gotta be something we can only uncover@as Magical Girls, don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: Huh, that could be so.

group_1.textRight: First off, I'll use my powers to see if there's@any malicious intent around here!
[chara:102601:effect_shake]Nnnn...@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1:eyeClose_0]Nope, nothing.

group_1.textLeft: Rats, no leads from that...

group_1.textRight: So, if we touch this monument...
My theory is that it'll react to our magic...
...and light up and start revealing@a secret message!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Feels like somethin' out of@a sci-fi movie or somethin'.

group_1.textRight: "The truth doesn't always appear to be real."
At least, that's what Kouichi Todoroki says.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Who's that?

group_1.textRight: The vagabond detective, Kouichi Todoroki!@It's my favorite show!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so that's what's up.
Well, I'll follow your lead, then.@Let's put our hands on this rock.

group_1.textRight: Alright!

group_1.textLeft: Okay...[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_200][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]here goes!
(That's...the same voice I heard back@on the beach.)
(She sounds...so lonely...)

group_1.textRight: Hmm...I swore I heard someone say@"I'll be waiting for you"...?

group_1.textLeft: Then you heard it, too, Chiharu!

group_1.textRight: Wait, so did you?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I guess I shouldn't put it aside@anymore.
Basically, I heard that same voice at@the beach this morning, too.

group_1.textRight: Really?!
Does that mean...we have a huge mystery@on our hands?!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe so...
(...But is this voice a clue to the sunken ship?)
(Mitama and I have to head home tomorrow...)
(If it doesn't have anything to do with the@shipwreck, there's no point in investigating...)
(What should we do?)
